Moko.text: hello tell me a weather in new york city

I currently don't have real-time access to weather data. However, you can easily check the current weather in New York City by using weather websites or apps like:

- **Weather.com** (The Weather Channel)

- **AccuWeather**

- **BBC Weather**

- **Google Weather** (just search "New York City weather")

These sources will provide you with up-to-date information on temperature, precipitation, and forecasts. If you have any other questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
